item.title: Alexa, what is my WiFi password?
item.description: Taking a closer look at the Echo Dot 2nd generation using a known CPU exploit reveals a lack of security for its password storage.

item.title: Rooting the Amazon Echo Dot
item.description: A new method to gain a tethered root shell on the Echo Dot 2nd generation by patching the Little Kernel.

item.title: ThinkLED
item.description: ThinkLED is a simple flutter app for thinkpads using tpacpi on linux. It can be used to toggle the power and lid LEDs, or transmit a message in morse code using the lid LED. This is my first flutter project.
